nl.strohalm.cyclos.scheduling.polling
Class PollingTask

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      nl.strohalm.cyclos.scheduling.polling.PollingTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AccountActivationPollingTask, AdInterestsNotificationPollingTask, BulkMessageSendingPollingTask, ChargeAccountFeePollingTask, ServiceClientIpResolvingPollingTask, SmsMailingSendingPollingTask
public abstract class PollingTask
extends java.lang.Thread

Base class for tasks which keeps looking for available data to be processed. When running in a cluster, it is guaranteed that only a single node runs the same polling task at the same time.

Author:
luis

runTask

protected abstract boolean runTask()
Should be implemented by subclasses to perform the actual task. Returning true means that this method should be immediately invoked right after this execution. False means the thread will sleep until the next execution.
